#summary Target platform information

= Goals =

  * PINF will run seamlessly with no configuration on any and all platforms that PEAR runs on
  * PINF will tie seamlessly into all popular PHP server stacks with no configuration

= Details =

== Platforms ==

  * Max OS X *(Actively maintained)*
  * Linux
  * Windows (some functionality may not be available)

== PHP Server Stacks ==

Some functionality may not be available on every server stack.

  * [http://www.zend.com/en/products/server/ ZendServer] *(Initial development focus)*
    * Contributors
      * Christoph Dorn
      * Jess Portnoy
  * [http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp.html XAMPP]
  * [http://www.easyphp.org/ EasyPHP]
  * [http://www.rpath.org/project/lamp/ rBuilder LAMP Appliance]
  * [http://httpd.apache.org/ Apache HTTP Server]
